column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is a fantastic bakery and breakfast/lunch spot. Their pastries are always delicious (the pistachio croissant is a favorite of my husband's) and the food is consistently good to excellent. I've found the staff to be friendly
column2: although since it's an order at the counter style restaurant
column3: there isn't much service to speak of. But the atmosphere is casual and comfortable. The tables are very close together and it does get crowded
column4: so sometimes it can feel a little bit like a sardine can
column5: but such is the price of a good meal.
